Events.OnCreate:
(block (gateList)
(switch ; Find a stargate more than 300 light-seconds away (not (setq gateList (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "GR:300; -uncharted;"))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Create the mission (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'gateID (objGetID (random gateList)))
(msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 150) ) ) )
Events.OnStarted:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (travelTime (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance cscObj gateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) ) ; Pick a random situation (msnSetData gSource 'variant (random (list 'ares 'ares 'ares 'ares 'ares 'ares 'rogue 'rogue 'rogue 'attack )))
(msnAddTimerEvent gSource (+ travelTime (random 100 400)) 'OnFreighterArrives) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed: (switch ; Freighter destroyed (= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) (if (= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'kamikaze) (msnSuccess gSource) (msnFailure gSource) ) )
Events.OnFreighterArrives:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (gateObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID))) (variant (msnGetData gSource 'variant)) shipObj travelTime ) (plyMessage gPlayer "Freighter arrived!")
; Create the superfreighter (setq shipObj (sysCreateShip &scScarabFreighter; gateObj &svCommonwealth;)) (objSetData shipObj 'noPiracyCheck True) (objSetIdentified shipObj)
(shpOrder shipObj 'dock cscObj) (shpOrder shipObj 'wait (random 6 18)) (shpOrder shipObj 'gate)
; Register for events (msnSetData gSource 'freighterID (objGetID shipObj)) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource shipObj)
; Update state and player target (msnSetData gSource 'state 'inbound) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource)
; Calculate travel time for setting ambush (setq travelTime (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance cscObj gateObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed shipObj))) (dbgOutput "trabvel time: " travelTime) ; Variant specific setup (switch (= variant 'ares) (block Nil (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (random 1000 1500) shipObj &etAresAmbush4; (random 120 200) ) (if (leq (random 1 100) 90) (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (random 1000 1500) gPlayerShip &etAresAmbush2; (random 120 200) ) ) (if (leq (random 1 100) 20) (sysAddEncounterEventAtDist (random 1350 1900) shipObj &etAresAmbush2; (random 120 200) ) ) ) (= variant 'rogue) (block ( (pathPos (random 35 65)) ambushPos mineLayer waitPos ) (setq ambushPos (sysGetNavPathPoint &svCommonwealth; gateObj cscObj pathPos )) ; Create a rogue transport that will lay mines in the path (setq mineLayer (sysCreateShip &scRogueMineLayer; ambushPos &svRogueFleet;)) (objSetData mineLayer 'MinePos ambushPos)
; Create a bunch of mines in addition (for i 0 (random 10 20) (sysCreateWeaponFire &itStaticMine; mineLayer (sysVectorPolarOffset ambushPos (random 0 359) (random 1 5)) 0 0 Nil) )
; Figure out where the centurions will wait (setq waitPos (sysGetNavPathPoint &svCommonwealth; gateObj cscObj (+ pathPos 15) )) (setq waitPos (sysCreateMarker "" waitPos &svRogueFleet;))
; Create some centurions that will attack once the freighter ; goes through the mines (for i 0 (random 2 4) (block (theShip thePos) (setq thePos (sysVectorPolarOffset waitPos (random 0 359) (random 10 14))) (setq theShip (sysCreateShip &scCenturion; thePos &svRogueFleet;)) (shpOrderPatrol theShip waitPos 7) ) )
) (= variant 'attack) (block Nil (objAddItem shipObj (itmCreate &itHydrogenGas; 500)) (msnAddRecurringTimerEvent gSource 31 'OnSuicideRunCheck) ) ) )
Events.OnSuicideRunCheck:
(block ( (cscObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID))) (shipObj (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID))) (dist (objGetDistance cscObj shipObj)) ) (dbgOutput dist) (switch (not shipObj) (msnCancelTimerEvent gSource 'OnSuicideRunCheck)
(ls dist 5) (block ( (thePos (objGetPos shipObj)) ) (msnFailure gSource) (msnCancelTimerEvent gSource 'OnSuicideRunCheck) (objDestroy shipObj shipObj) (sysCreateWeaponFire &itM5Missile; Nil thePos 0 0 cscObj True) )
(and (ls dist 40) (= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'kamikaze)) (block Nil (if (leq (random 1 100) 25) (objSendMessage gPlayerShip cscObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgHurry)) ) )
(and (ls dist 60) (!= (msnGetData gSource 'status) 'kamikaze)) (block Nil ; Freighter is on sucide run (shpCancelOrders shipObj) (shpOrder shipObj 'goto cscObj) (shpOrder shipObj 'hold)
; Set the CSC to wait (so that it doesn't blast the freighter on its own) ; we assume that the CSC is caught by surprise ; Not needed as the freighter is still "friendly" ;(shpCancelOrders cscObj) ;(shpOrder cscObj 'wait 15) ;(shpOrder cscObj 'hold)
; Player should destroy freighter (objSendMessage gPlayerShip cscObj (msnTranslate gSource 'msgKamikaze))
(msnSetData gSource 'status 'kamikaze) (msnSetPlayerTarget gSource) ) ) )
Events.OnSetPlayerTarget:
(switch (not (msnGetData gSource 'state)) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'gateID)) 'dock)
(= (msnGetData gSource 'state) 'kamikaze) (rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) 'attack)
(rpgSetTarget gSource aReason (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'freighterID)) 'escort) )
